%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% Insight Poster Template v0.3.2
%
% https://github.com/igorbrigadir/insight-templates
%
% Based on beamerposter class 
% http://www.ctan.org/pkg/beamerposter
% http://www-i6.informatik.rwth-aachen.de/~dreuw/latexbeamerposter.php
%
% Needs up to date TeX (Tested with TeX 2014)
%
% To install ubuntu fonts in LaTeX:
% https://github.com/tzwenn/ubuntu-latex-fonts

% Required Packages - Do not edit these:
\documentclass[final,hyperref={pdfpagelabels=false}]{beamer}
\mode<presentation>{\usetheme{Insight}}
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\PassOptionsToPackage{cmyk}{xcolor}
\usepackage{ubuntu}

% Set Size of poster with size= property: a0, a1, a2, a3. Default is A0
\usepackage[orientation=portrait,size=a0,scale=1.4,debug]{beamerposter}

% Required Packages - Do not edit these:
\usepackage[english]{babel}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usepackage{calc}
\usepackage{tcolorbox}
\usepackage{graphics}
\usepackage[percent]{overpic}
\usepackage{ragged2e}
\usepackage{amsmath,amsthm, amssymb, latexsym}
\boldmath
\tcbuselibrary{skins}
\usetikzlibrary{shadings}
\graphicspath{{figures/}} % Settings
\addtobeamertemplate{block begin}{}{\justifying} % Justify text
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

% Add any other Optional Packages Here:
%\usepackage{epstopdf} % \includegraphics converts eps to pdf
\usepackage{blindtext} % Used for Example Text

% If you have a really long title, uncomment this next line:
\setbeamerfont*{title in headline}{size=\veryHuge,family=\fontUbuntuLight}

% A really long title example:
\title{A Something something: Really really unnecessarily long title of your poster just because you can}

% If you have a long title and or lots of authors, uncomment this next line:
\setbeamerfont*{author in headline}{size=\large,family=\fontUbuntuMedium}

% Use \\ if First and Second names get split between lines. Example:
\author{Author One, Author Two, Reallylongfirstname Reallyreallylongsecondname, \\ Another Author, Someone Else, Another Person}

% If you need to change the default Acknowledgement, uncomment & edit one of these lines:

% Default:
%\renewcommand{\acknowledgements}{The Insight Centre for Data Analytics is supported by Science Foundation Ireland under Grant Number SFI/12/RC/2289}

% Alternative Acknowledgement:
%\renewcommand{\acknowledgements}{This publication has emanated from research conducted with the financial support of Science Foundation Ireland (SFI) under Grant Number SFI/12/RC/2289}

% SFI & Some other funding:
%\renewcommand{\acknowledgements}{This publication has emanated from research supported in part by a research grant from Science Foundation Ireland (SFI) under Grant Number SFI/12/RC/2289}

\begin{document}
\begin{frame}{}

\begin{columns}[T] % 2 Column Layout
\begin{column}{.43\paperwidth} % Left Column
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% LEFT COLUMN BLOCKS:
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\begin{block}{Large Headings typeset in Ubuntu Regular, at 18 point on 21 point line spacing}
Text Here \dots

\blocksubtitle{Subheading in u block test}
More Text \blindtext
\blocksubtitle{Subhead block b54}
List Items \blinditemize
\end{block}

\begin{block}{Second Large Heading Large Heading Large Heading}
Text Here \blinddescription
\blocksubtitle{Subheading in block test}
More Text \blindtext
\end{block}

\begin{block}{Large Heading colour is C100 M0 Y0 K48}
Math example \blindmathtrue
More Text \blindtext
\end{block}

\end{column}
\begin{column}{.43\paperwidth} % Right Column
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
% RIGHT COLUMN BLOCKS:
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\begin{block}{Introduction}
	\begin{itemize}
		\item some items and $\alpha=\beta,\gamma_{i}$
		\item some items
		\item some items
		\item some items
	\end{itemize}

	$$\Delta M_i^{-1} = - \alpha \sum_{n=1}^N D_i \left[ n \right] \left[ \sum_{j \in C \left[ i \right]}^{} F_{ji} \left[ n-1 \right] + Fext_i \left[ n^{-1} \right] \right]$$
\end{block}

\begin{block}{Text sizes}
\centering
	{\tiny tiny}\par
	{\scriptsize scriptsize}\par
	{\footnotesize footnotesize}\par
	{\normalsize normalsize}\par
	{\large large}\par
	{\Large Large}\par
	{\LARGE LARGE}\par
	{\veryHuge veryHuge}\par
	{\VeryHuge VeryHuge}\par
	{\VERYHuge VERYHuge}\par
\end{block}

\begin{block}{Graphics}
\includegraphics[width=\textwidth]{insightlogo.pdf} \\
Text Here \blindtext
\blocksubtitle{Subheading in u block test}
More Text \blindtext
\end{block}

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
\end{column}
\end{columns}
\end{frame}
\end{document}
